title: Create Redux state
description: Create a Redux state slice for a React project.

project.description: The name of the project to add the slice to. If it is an application, then the store configuration will be updated too.
project.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. The project will be determined from the directory provided. It will be removed in Nx v19.

directory.description: The directory at which to create the Redux files. When `--nameAndDirectoryFormat=as-provided`, it will be relative to the current working directory. Otherwise, it will be relative to the project root.

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the component in the directory as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).

appProject.description: The application project to add the slice to.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.
